label: GoogleNews
description: Arcade.dev LLM tools for getting new via Google News

tools.name: SearchNewsStories
tools.description: Search for news articles related to a given query.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Keywords to search for news articles. E.g. 'Apple launches new iPhone'.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: 2-character country code to search for news articles. E.g. 'us' (United States). Defaults to 'None'.

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description: 2-character language code to search for news articles. E.g. 'en' (English). Defaults to 'en'.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of news articles to return. Defaults to None (returns all results found by the API).

output.description: News search results with article details.

documentationChunks.content:
The Arcade Google News MCP Server uses the [SerpAPI](https://serpapi.com/) to get news data from Google News.

- **Secret:**
  - `SERP_API_KEY`: Your SerpAPI API key.

<Callout type="info">
  Setting the `SERP_API_KEY` secret is only required if you are [self-hosting](/guides/deployment-hosting/configure-engine) Arcade. If you're using Arcade Cloud, the secret is already set for you. To manage your secrets, go to the [Secrets page](https://api.arcade.dev/dashboard/auth/secrets) in the Arcade Dashboard.
</Callout>

Language and Country are configurable through environment variables. When set, they will be used as defaults for Google News tools.

Providing a different value as `language_code` or `country_code` argument in the tool call will override the default value.

**Language**

- The language code is a 2-character code that determines the language in which the API will search and return news articles.
- `ARCADE_GOOGLE_LANGUAGE`: a default value for all Google search tools. If not set, defaults to `en` (English).
- `ARCADE_GOOGLE_NEWS_LANGUAGE`: a default value for the news search tools. If not set, defaults to `ARCADE_GOOGLE_LANGUAGE`.

A list of supported language codes can be found [here](#languagecodes).

**Country**

- The country code is a 2-character code that determines the country in which the API will search for news articles.
- `ARCADE_GOOGLE_NEWS_COUNTRY`: a default value for the `SearchNews` tool. If not set, defaults to `None` (search news globally).

A list of supported country codes can be found [here](#countrycodes).

summary:
The Arcade toolkit for GoogleNews enables developers to retrieve the latest news articles through a seamless integration with Google News. This toolkit provides efficient access to current stories based on queries, ensuring users stay informed.

### Capabilities
- Access to real-time news articles from Google News.
- Query-based searching for specific topics or events.
- Easy integration into applications for timely updates.

### OAuth  
No OAuth authentication is required, but API key usage is necessary for accessing the service.

### Secrets  
Developers must use the following secret type for accessing the API:  
- **API Key**: SERP_API_KEY, required for API access.
